about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of the world of Fallen Seeds through the game’s music. The soundtrack includes a variety of genres: from indie and fusion to oriental motifs and electronic rock, capturing all the shades of Evoid’s adventures on the planet Ulthar.

Enjoy the music in high-quality FLAC format to feel the full depth and nuances of the compositions, or in a more compact MP3 format.

Authors:

The compositions are written by the project’s composer, Danil Bazhenov, with contributions from the Shuttle Team 311-X and Vilena Sokolova.

The compositions are written by the project’s composer, Danil Bazhenov, with contributions from the Shuttle Team 311-X and Vilena Sokolova.
name: Fallen Seeds Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 500 MB available space

short_description: Enjoy the atmospheric soundtrack of the sci-fi visual novel Fallen Seeds, featuring tracks in indie, fusion, ethnic, and electronic rock genres that highlight the game's plot and emotions.
